summary: "Bluey" is an Australian animated TV show for preschoolers that started in 2018. It's about a lively 6-year-old Blue Heeler puppy named Bluey who loves to play imaginatively with her family. She lives with her dad (Bandit), mom (Chilli), and little sister (Bingo). The show explores themes of family, growing up, and Australian culture. It's set in Brisbane, where it was created. "Bluey" is very popular in Australia and has won many awards for its portrayal of family life and positive parenting. You can watch it on ABC Kids in Australia and Disney Junior in the US.
title: Bluey (2018 TV series)
